ca.tirtech.etchpad.colors

Class ColorPalette

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.databinding.BaseObservable
      • ca.tirtech.etchpad.mvvm.LiveDataObservable
        • ca.tirtech.etchpad.colors.ColorPalette
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    androidx.databinding.Observable

    public class ColorPalette
extends LiveDataObservable
    A container class for lists of colors. One color may be selected and cycled trough using nextColor(). Colors may be added and removed from the palette up to an unlimited amount

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface androidx.databinding.Observable

        androidx.databinding.Observable.OnPropertyChangedCallback

      private int selectedColor
      Index of color that is selected in the colors list.
